product_name: Timex Ironman 50-Lap Sleek Digital Watch - Men's
long_description: The full-size Timex Ironman Triathlon 50-Lap Sleek digital watch has Ironman-ready features and a sleek, aerodynamic design. Unique design features an easy-to-use, push-button format. Training log stores workouts by date, including best lap, average lap and total segment time. Features 50-lap/split time memory recall, 100-hr. chronograph with lap or split option and 99 interval repetition counter. Total Run chronograph format excludes rest periods for accurate times on long runs or bike rides. 24-hr. countdown timer includes countdown stop and countdown repeat. 3 programmable audible alarms with 5-minute back-up alarm and on/off hourly chime. INDIGLO(R) Night-Light illuminates the display for easy use at night. Linked timers for speed workouts and walk/run marathons (walk 1 minute/run 8 minutes). Timex Ironman Triathlon 50-Lap Sleek digital watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The full-size Timex Ironman Triathlon 50-Lap Sleek digital watch has Ironman-ready features and a sleek, aerodynamic design.
